headline: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Caterpillar Inc. on Rijnberk InvestInsights’s Substack by Daan | InvestInsights. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CAT. Caterpillar Inc.’s share was trading at $759.74 as of February 20th. CAT’s trailing and forward P/E were 40.39 and 23.20 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) has long […]

headline: Caterpillar (CAT)’s Growth is Remarkable, Says Jim Cramer

headline: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) Strengthens Data Mining Technology Portfolio After Record Sales
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is one of the best manufacturing stocks to invest in now. On February 17, Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) confirmed the acquisition of RPMGlobal Holdings Limited. The acquisition of the Australian-based mining software company is poised to expand the company’s portfolio of data-driven mining technology. Caterpillar Inc. gains access to crucial software solutions that […]

headline: Progress Rail Settlement Eases Legal Overhang For Caterpillar Investors
summary: Progress Rail, a subsidiary of Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT), has settled an antitrust legal dispute with Wabtec. The settlement resolves ongoing litigation and allows both companies to remain suppliers of freight locomotives and cab components. The resolution removes a source of uncertainty tied to Progress Rail’s role in the freight rail market. Caterpillar, through Progress Rail, is a key supplier to the freight rail sector, alongside its broader presence in construction and mining equipment...
